name: Termimon
description:
The world has been taken over by the Internet of Things!

You play as Linus, a self-taught hacker which has to battle machines in turn-based combat and capture stronger machines to progress. Travel to different villages gathering data and items needed to stop the Internet of Things.

The game is only contains one area and a single boss for trying out the concept. If I one day return to this project I will add the rest of the story and content.

How to play:

  • Play with your keyboard or controller. 
  • Go around and talk to people. They have useful info and items for you.
  • Try to use the typings and energy of your machines to the fullest.
  • Save often.
